alert.note: Alert for Northern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:37PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Harrison and northern Jackson Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 336 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Latimer, or 14 miles north of St. Martin, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Point, Hurley, Wade, Vancleave and Latimer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
